docs.snippet: Corrections appearing in print on Tuesday, March 13, 2018.
In a red-hot start to the governor’s race, Ms. Nixon attacked the governor’s liberal bona fides, while an ally of his called her an “unqualified lesbian.”

headline.print_headline: In Campaign Debut, Nixon Asks if Cuomo Is a ‘Real Democrat’
headline.main: Cynthia Nixon Asks if Cuomo Is a ‘Real Democrat’ at Campaign Debut

docs.snippet: The National Labor Relations Board’s chief lawyer, a Trump appointee, is moving to reach a settlement to avert a landmark ruling against the company.

headline.print_headline: Franchise  Settlement Steers Clear Of Solution
headline.main: Push to Settle McDonald’s Case, a Threat to Franchise Model

docs.snippet: The British envoy used a Security Council meeting to formally accuse the Russians. His American counterpart called the attack “an atrocious crime.”

headline.print_headline: Diplomatic Fireworks at U.N. Over Britain-Russia Feud
headline.main: Diplomatic Fireworks at U.N. Over Britain-Russia Feud

docs.snippet: The new name, Rassemblement National, means National Rally or Gathering. Ms. Le Pen hopes a rebranding may reinvigorate the struggling party.

headline.print_headline: France’s Far-Right Leader  Proposes New Name for Party
headline.main: Marine Le Pen Proposes New Name for National Front

docs.snippet: In this week’s newsletter: tracking the ethics issues surrounding the chief of the Environmental Protection Agency.

headline.print_headline: A Trip to Morocco. A Condo Rental. Here’s Why Scott Pruitt Is Under Fire.
headline.main: A Trip to Morocco. A Condo Rental. Here’s Why Scott Pruitt Is Under Fire.

docs.snippet: Even as trade tensions are mounting between the United States and China, the importance of Chinese moviegoers to Hollywood has never been more apparent.

headline.print_headline: Propelled by China, Overseas Moviegoing Surges
headline.main: Propelled by China, Overseas Moviegoing Surges

docs.snippet: Settlement agreements — now made public after a judge’s ruling — provide new details on tactics used by the former Fox News host against women who accused him of sexual harassment.

headline.print_headline: Settlement Agreements Reveal How O’Reilly Silenced His Accusers
headline.main: How Bill O’Reilly Silenced His Accusers

docs.snippet: Ms. Nixon, an education activist best known for her work on “Sex and the City,” is expected to challenge Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo from the political left.

headline.print_headline: Celebrity Challenge to Cuomo  Cites Inequality and the M.T.A.
headline.main: Cynthia Nixon Enters Race for New York Governor

docs.snippet: Carey Mulligan stars in a new Netflix drama. And Megyn Kelly interviews Vladimir Putin, again.
